article.title: U.S. Navy Modifies Dual Band Radar Contract
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.text: Raytheon Co., Integrated Defense Systems, Tewksbury, Mass., is being awarded a not-to-exceed $23,760,905 contract modification to previously awarded contract for the execution of Phase II CVN 78 dual band radar test and evaluation engineering support at the Raytheon Integrated Defense Systems Software Development Laboratory and Wallops Island Engineering Test Center Land Based Test Site. The Naval Sea Systems Command, Washington Navy Yard, Washington, D.C., is the contracting activity.
